Page.title: Array Shrinking
Page.text: Using the potential power contained within a nether star, the dimensional interference of an enderpearl and a sheet of paper, we have discovered a way to "shrink" an array down into something that can be transported!
With this new array we can move and place a smaller version of the shrunken array. Although it appears to be inert at time of placing, giving the correct items reactivates the shrunken array.
An example of this is shrinking down of a crafting array could allow one to have it within their home. Or potentially shrink down a Barrier Array for a smaller effect
